name: Nightmare Simulator 2 Rebirth
description:
You wake up in an unknown town... You have no idea what happened to you.
You can't remember who you are but the first thing you see is a town.
You head towards it unknowingly walking into danger... Monsters...
Monsters everywhere!

Can you survive and find the answers you seek about who you once were?

[Features]

1. Cutscenes
2. Advanced inventory.
3. Auto save
4. Based on real map of Andong&Busan, Korea.
